03.synopsis: Pissed off duergar raider who is standing guard while the gnomes are digging up a collapsed tunnel. He is cursing his superior, saying they should just let him suffocate. The player can make use of this and threathen the duergar, saying they will tell the sergeant unless the duergar gives them money.

Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -615 14.1694. Destroy the wall (Ctrl-Shift-K)5. Side with rebels.6. killcombat.7. Talk with ThuddTo trigger Nere Killed hasmet.1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -615 14.1694. Talk toThudd5. Destroy the wall (Ctrl-Shift-K)6. Side with rebels.7. killcombat.8. Talk with Thudd

03_0.speaker: Thudd
03_0.text: Good riddance. Hoon caused nothing but trouble.

03_1.speaker: Thudd
03_1.context: NodeContext: drugning is an expletive (like fucking), pronounced DRUG-ning (g is silent for duergar)

03_2.speaker: Thudd
03_2.text: Shouldn't go saying it, but the clan owes you.

03_3.speaker: Thudd
03_3.text: Drugnin' True Soul getting himself trapped. Let him suffocate, if the Absolute can't save him.
03_3.context: NodeContext: drugning is an expletive (like fucking), pronounced DRUG-ning (g is silent for duergar). He's muttering to himself.

03_4.speaker: Thudd
03_4.text: Get a drugnin' move on, 'fore they start pointin' fingers.
03_4.context: NodeContext: drugning is an expletive (like fucking), pronounced DRUG-ning (g is silent for duergar)

03_5.speaker: Thudd
03_5.text: Drugnin' drow, messing with minds. The hoon deserves what's coming.
03_5.context: NodeContext: drugning is an expletive (like fucking), pronounced DRUG-ning (g is silent for duergar)
